title: Client won't open
body: When I try to open the client, the old client screen (screen that was there when you were patching with launch at the top center in orange and LoL in the top left) popped up. When I pressed launch, it disappears with the sound but nothing happens. For some reason my shortcut on my homescreen is still the old LoL logo, the one with the blue square and when my client was open in my task bar it was a blank sheet. Aldo in the file League of Legends there is lol.launcher which is the shortcut I'm using and lol.launcher.admin. There is also LeagueClient but when I try to open it says it can't run on my PC and to check with the developer. LeagueClient also doesn't have the right icon with the circle and L

replies.body: It sounds like a security setting is preventing you from launching properly and getting you on the most up to date version.  The first step I recommend ehre is running through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your game filers are being accepted as an exception.  This step includes running a repair through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well.  Go through these and let me know how it goes.
Can you please tell me what to do in the setting up the permissions. My windows is up to date
It's really important to go over each step to make sure everything is covered, and possibilities are ruled out.
